name: QuotesToday
0: ”Alexa, open Quotes Today and give me a quote.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: quotes today
des: Gives you a random quote! Say "give me a quote" or "quote" to get a randomized quote. Say "Stop" to exit inside the skill. Based on quotes API from https://talaikis.com/random_quotes_api/
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
